products.name: UrbanFlex Oversized Hoodie
products.description: Cozy cotton-blend hoodie with dropped shoulders and minimalist logo embroidery. Available in charcoal gray, sand beige, and moss green.

products.name: AeroFit Seamless Leggings
products.description: High-waisted, body-sculpting leggings designed for comfort and movement. Sweat-wicking fabric ideal for workouts or daily wear.

products.name: Luna Linen Button-Up Shirt
products.description: Lightweight, breathable linen shirt featuring a relaxed fit and natural coconut shell buttons. Perfect for summer days.

products.name: Nordic Knit Crewneck Sweater
products.description: Chunky knit sweater with Scandinavian-inspired patterns. Made from ultra-soft recycled yarns for warmth and style.

products.name: EcoDenim Straight Jeans
products.description: Classic mid-rise straight jeans crafted from organic cotton denim. Minimal wash for a clean, modern look.

products.name: Velora Satin Midi Skirt
products.description: Elegant satin midi skirt with side slit and soft drape. Dress it up for evening events or pair with a tee for a casual look.

products.name: TrailTech Windbreaker Jacket
products.description: Lightweight, water-resistant jacket with reflective detailing and adjustable hem. Ideal for outdoor adventures.

products.name: SoftStep Lounge Joggers
products.description: Ultra-soft fleece joggers with elastic waistband and cuffed ankles. Designed for all-day comfort.

products.name: RetroWave Graphic Tee
products.description: Vintage-inspired unisex t-shirt featuring bold retro prints. 100% combed cotton for a soft touch.

products.name: Nomad Wool Overcoat
products.description: Tailored long overcoat made from premium wool blend. Double-breasted closure and deep pockets for timeless elegance.

products.name: Summit Trail Puffer Vest
products.description: Lightweight insulated vest with zip pockets and packable design. Keeps you warm without bulk.

products.name: TerraCore Cargo Pants
products.description: Utility-inspired cargo pants with tapered fit and multiple functional pockets. Durable yet comfortable.

products.name: CloudKnit Zip-Up Hoodie
products.description: Midweight hoodie made with cloud-soft knit fabric. Zippered front and spacious kangaroo pockets.

products.name: EcoStride Canvas Sneakers
products.description: Low-top sneakers made from recycled canvas with a natural rubber sole. Minimalist design for everyday wear.

products.name: Summerset Denim Jacket
products.description: Classic denim jacket with subtle distressing and contrast stitching. Timeless layering piece.

products.name: ArcticTherm Parka Coat
products.description: Heavyweight insulated parka with faux-fur hood trim and weatherproof shell for cold climates.

products.name: MetroBelt Leather Bag
products.description: Sleek crossbody bag with adjustable strap, inner compartments, and metal hardware details.

products.name: PeakTrail Hiking Boots
products.description: Waterproof hiking boots with rugged grip and cushioned midsole for all-day trail comfort.

products.name: ZenLite Yoga Shorts
products.description: Flexible and breathable yoga shorts with high waistband and hidden pocket.

products.name: BreezeCotton Polo Shirt
products.description: Classic short-sleeve polo with breathable pique texture and subtle logo embroidery.
